extension.name: System - CB Core Redirect
extension.author: Kyle (aka Krileon)
extension.description: Automatically redirects from Joomla core user pages (Login, Registration, Forgot Login) to CBs user pages.

field.name: rewrite_urls
field.label: Rewrite URLs
field.description: Enable or disable rewriting of Joomla Users component URLs to CB URLs.

field.name: itemids
field.label: Itemids
field.description: Enable or disable parsing of URLs for Itemid if missing.
